changeSet.author: pwadmore
changeSet.sql: CREATE OR ALTER VIEW FFF_STAGING.V_ACTIVE_TIMESERIES_STAGING_EXCEPTION AS SELECT tse.* FROM FFF_STAGING.TIMESERIES_STAGING_EXCEPTION tse WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT itse.id FROM FFF_STAGING.INACTIVE_TIMESERIES_STAGING_EXCEPTION itse WHERE itse.TIMESERIES_STAGING_EXCEPTION_ID = tse.ID )

rollback.sql: CREATE OR ALTER VIEW FFF_STAGING.V_ACTIVE_TIMESERIES_STAGING_EXCEPTION AS SELECT tse.* FROM FFF_STAGING.TIMESERIES_STAGING_EXCEPTION tse WHERE tse.ACTIVE = 1
